mapper.select: SELECT a.product_code, a.product_name, a.product_price, a.product_description, b.category_code as "category.category_code", b.category_name as "category.category_name", a.product_image_url, a.product_stock FROM tbl_product a JOIN tbl_category b ON (a.category_code = b.category_code) WHERE product_code = #{ productCode } AND status = 'USABLE'
